name: Wathan Games
description:
Discover "Wathan Games"


"Wathan Games" is designed to build bridges between streamers and their viewers, turning every game into an opportunity to strengthen community bonds.

Key Features


Community Interactivity: Turn viewers into active participants, giving them the chance to influence your live streams.

Unique Graphics: Dive into a visually rich universe, entirely hand-drawn by "My name is Ebo", ensuring a unique and immersive experience.

"Year 4815": An Interactive Adventure: Embark on the first chapter that combines quizzes and exploration. With diverse levels and artifacts that change the gameplay, this adventure tests both your knowledge and agility, while enhancing community interaction.

Global Leaderboard: Introduce a level of competitiveness with a worldwide ranking, allowing for performance comparison not only between communities by channel but also among viewers, thus enhancing the challenge and engagement.

Rich and Diverse Content: Enjoy thousands of questions spread across a wide range of categories, including video games, ensuring a fresh and stimulating experience each gaming session.

Join "Wathan Games" and take part in a gaming adventure where every session is an opportunity to strengthen ties, share experiences, and measure up against the rest of the world.
